message.body: Dave just walked me all the way home and tried to tell me to say Anu is crazy and I got sompissed off that I told him that I would say both of them are crazy.
He knows I'm probably going to say bad things and he's being so manipulative.
It's really unprofessional!
Sorry. Venting. Done.
Wait. I also told him I think I doing a ton more work in the last few months and he said "tayarisha is really busy with other stuff.". So whatever.
UGH
He is really overcompensating
Maybe he should channel that energy into doing some actual work
Yeah instead of making me stay late to show him premiere because he was at the Ec
Tayarisha is busy with other stuff? But y'all have the exact same job
Allegedly
You were pretty clear about having to leave at, you know, your scheduled time
And you probably never even took comp time after staying super late the other week
So you should really get to leave early
Haha.
Or already come in at 11
Um yeah
I don't mean to make light of depression but I'm not sure that seasonal affective disorder means you get to come in at 11:30 and leave at 5
Sorry I drank a beer and apparently now I am mad!
I need a beer! I grades so many papers and packed so many boxes.
I have too much stuff.
Uh oh Dave is having a meeting with just him and tayarisha
Today he told me I have to say Anu is crazy in my exit interview
The saga continues
Omg! He is so paranoid!
I think Anu made him have that meeting!!
Ohh I see
